original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields down at open
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were down at open on Friday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond was quoted at 31.00/40 percent on Friday, down from 31.25/50 percent a day earlier.
A 15.09.2027 bond was quoted at 28.00/50 percent, down from 28.10/30 percent a day earlier. (Colombo/ Mar 17/2023)
